amendatorysection.catchline: Banks; trust department; separation from other departments; powers; duties.
amendatorysection.para: The trust department of a bank when chartered under sections 8-159 to 8-161 shall be separate and apart from every other department of the bank and shall have all of the powers, duties, and obligations of a trust company provided in the Nebraska Trust Company Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Trust Company Act, see section 8-201.01.
